original_title: 義母と娘のブルース2020年謹賀新年スペシャル
overview: It is the autumn of 2019, one year since Miyamoto Akiko (Ayase Haruka) re-entered the workforce. Her job is based in Osaka and she has been living in apart from her step daughter Miyuki (Kamishiraishi Moka) who is in Tokyo. Headhunted by a major consulting firm Acxel Business Partners, Akiko has been working energetically.
title: Stepmom and Daughter Blues: 2020 New Year's Special
